application.doc: Retrieving the current active system routes

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving the current active system routes
method.doc: The current active system routes includes all system routes active on the appliance. This includes routes that are automatically generated or received for DHCP IP addresses if enabled.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: routes
param.doc: The active network routes on this system.

param.name: maskOrPrefix
param.doc: The IPv4 netmask or IPv6 prefix for this route.

param.name: gateway
param.doc: The gateway address for this route.

param.name: ifaceDevice
param.doc: The interface device associated with this route.

param.name: ifaceLabel
param.doc: The label of the interface device associated with this route.
